'''Radiant Spincrystal 113''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Rhythm of Inquiry]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located next to the start of a [[Time Trial Challenge]] in the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]].
